species.name: simisear
descriptions: A flame burns inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.
It loves sweets because they become energy for the fire burning inside its body.
When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.

abilities.name: gluttony
abilities.effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

abilities.name: blaze
abilities.effect: Strengthens fire moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
